desc: Update a Question for an event

event_id.desc: id of event release belongs to

field_type.desc: Checkboxes, Country, File, Select, Text or Textarea

required.desc: Does this question require a response or not. Default false

options.desc:
A line separated list of options for this question e.g. A
B
C. Only applies to Checkboxes or Select field questions.

options_free_text_field.desc: A custom label for the 'Other’ text field option if it’s enabled. Only applies to Checkboxes or Select field questions.

include_free_text_field.desc: Should an ‘Other’ text field be included alongside this question or not. Only applies to Checkboxes or Select field questions. Default false
